name: AVAsynchronousCIImageFilteringRequest
desc: An object that supprts using Core Image filters to process an individual video frame in a video composition.

items.name: var compositionTime: CMTime
items.desc: The time in the video composition corresponding to the frame being processed.

items.name: var renderSize: CGSize
items.desc: The width and height, in pixels, of the frame being processed.

items.name: func finish(with: CIImage, context: CIContext?)
items.desc: Provides the filtered video frame image to AVFoundation for further processing or display.

items.name: func finish(with: Error)
items.desc: Notifies AVFoundation that you cannot fulfill the image filtering request.
